scariest guy iv seen in a long time.

the pope.

I feel like I'm so blah! I don't know why went all psycho over me and having a little fun. Oh yeah. I was supposed to get together with and Thursday but I don't want to anymore. I'm so tired of seeing the same people. And also it's so not fair that I have this morning off but nobody wants to do anything :-(. I'll just sit home alone and cry. Oh and I am totally going to ban from commenting in my LJ for what they said about !!!! This entry automatically generated by the LJ Drama Generator!

Last night my cat had kittens. this is a close up of her vagina whith two of the embelical cords stretched out to the kittens breast-feeding. it was a pretty rough pregnancy for her. she carried them for a really long time, and over the corse of four hours had seven kittens, then in the morning, had another. close-up picture a video of the joy of childbirth more video, turn the sound up more video, slimey maggoty beasts we were a little worried during this last month that she might just have two full grown cats, but she had eight kittens and 2 pounds of placenta to eat (wich andrew stepped in after she ate it and threw it back up next to the drumset) six lived, wich isnt bad the others are the most developed, and mobile newborns i have ever seen. the first video is a little rough, her fourth kitten didnt come out to fast and she really didnt want to be touched.. spyros stopped by on the way to canada with amanda and sean. quick pic of me, notice the hair color, amanda did it the day before, she wanted to try out this really nice european brand of toners. after 40v peroxide, its 50/50 pearl based lift toner combined with a violet based lift toner, then afterwards toned with a steal grey. very nice Last weekends trip to Richmond was a really great time, and it yeilded some pictures so i thought id post some, deffinatelly one in the elevator of The Mastif, it is the size of a bathroom stall, i dont even think i was inside when i took this. this is it, The Mastif my currant -hands down choice- of hotels in the richmond area, in all its glory. i hope to be returning there soon. i had some questions about this while in a restoraunt parking lot. this site cleared some things up for me, and my money is on Pam Clark.
